original_text: If a deacon serves God's people well, then people will respect him as a good person. He will become strong to tell people about his faith in Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 집사의 직분을 잘한 자들은 아름다운 지위와 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 믿음에 큰 담력을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: If a deacon serves God's people well
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 집사가 하나님의 백성을 잘 섬긴다면

sentences.original_text: to tell people about his faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 믿음에 대해 사람들에게 말하기 위해
